html: Over 500 children are still waiting to be reunited with their parents, five weeks after the administration's deadline to reunify families. Every day they are made to wait is a tragedy.

html: John McCain believed that every citizen has a responsibility to make something of the freedoms given by our Constitution, and from his heroic service in the Navy to his 35 years in Congress, he lived by his creed every day.https://bit.ly/2wff9V5

html: Just got out of a matinee for Crazy Rich Asians, anything happen today? Just kidding. I've seen a lot of busy news days in my life, but tonight I think a Wild Turkey is in order just to take in the cable networks and prepare for tomorrow's papers. Wow. Just, Wow.
text:
Just got out of a matinee for Crazy Rich Asians, anything happen today? 
Just kidding. I've seen a lot of busy news days in my life, but tonight I think a Wild Turkey is in order just to take in the cable networks and prepare for tomorrow's papers. Wow. Just, Wow.

html: UN @RefugeesChief Filippo Grandi is gravely concerned about the civilian population caught in the crossfire in south-west Syria, including airstrikes and heavy shelling. An estimated 750,000 lives are in danger. His statement https://trib.al/R7uCVam
text:
UN @RefugeesChief Filippo Grandi is gravely concerned about the civilian population caught in the crossfire in south-west Syria, including airstrikes and heavy shelling. 

An estimated 750,000 lives are in danger. 

His statement https://trib.al/R7uCVam

html: Portugal. The Man condemn the change in policy to separate parents & children at the border. It’s a human rights violation, disgusting & indefensible. We vow to lend our support to this cause until this nightmare ends. For the children. #FamiliesBelongTogether
text: Portugal. The Man condemn the change in policy to separate parents & children at the border. It’s a human rights violation, disgusting & indefensible. We vow to lend our support to this cause until this nightmare ends. For the children. #FamiliesBelongTogether

html: We applaud Spain for its actions today in bringing to an end a sea-rescue crisis on the Mediterranean after a ship, the #Aquarius, was refused permission to land and disembark elsewhere more than 600 rescued people. Statement: https://trib.al/2CP4Fcz pic.twitter.com/ncYsNV1nvm
text:
We applaud Spain for its actions today in bringing to an end a sea-rescue crisis on the Mediterranean after a ship, the #Aquarius, was refused permission to land and disembark elsewhere more than 600 rescued people. 

Statement: https://trib.al/2CP4Fcz pic.twitter.com/ncYsNV1nvm

html: Our Goodwill Ambassador @KristinDavis was on Capitol Hill yesterday sharing w/ Congress emotional stories she heard from Rohingya refugees during a recent visit to Bangladesh Thank you, Kristin, for your tireless advocacy on behalf of the vulnerable people we serve #WithRefugeespic.twitter.com/CmhmpA5xSS
text:
Our Goodwill Ambassador @KristinDavis was on Capitol Hill yesterday sharing w/ Congress emotional stories she heard from Rohingya refugees during a recent visit to Bangladesh

Thank you, Kristin, for your tireless advocacy on behalf of the vulnerable people we serve #WithRefugeespic.twitter.com/CmhmpA5xSS
